body: * #145 - Replace Deprecation Checker with [Warning response header](https://kubernetes.io/blog/2020/09/03/warnings/) support.
* #143 - Upgrade kubernetes client to 24.2.0 and add policy/v1 API support.
*  #142 - Add workaround to support `Ingress` resources in `networking.k8s.io/v1`. Drop `apps/v1beta1` API version support.
* #140 - Bugfix/fix api exception handling

* #137 - Add __main__ module
* #138 - Bump jinja2 from 2.11.2 to 2.11.3
* #139 - Bump pyyaml from 5.3.1 to 5.4
* #136 - Use replace() API call for Custom Resources.

name: Diff command
body: https://github.com/2gis/k8s-handle/issues/121 The diff command have been supported.
* #133 - Fix custom resources deletion and update dependencies

name: Allow dashes at the dict parameter keys
body: #130 Allow dict keys with dashes
* #128 - Use replace() for Services instead of patch()
* #127 - Add support of autoscaling/v2beta2
https://github.com/2gis/k8s-handle/pull/125 - add list_files function to templates filter
* #126 - Fix deploy for deprecated api versions
* Add networking.k8s.io/v1beta1 API #123
* #120 - Fixed --skip-tags evaluation logic
* #118 - Add support of scheduling.k8s.io/v1
#115 - Add `to_yaml` filter to template processor (PR #116)

* #114 - Add checking available resources
* #113 - Add ability to specify regex for templates searching
Update kubernetes client version to 10.0.1
* #107 - Update list of deprecated api versions
* #106 - Update list of deprecated api versions
* #105 - Make CA certificate optional in config
* #104 - adding `groups` for templating
Skip deprecation check if VersionApi is unavailable (#102)
* #100 - k8s-handle infinitly waiting for DaemonSet update with `updateStrategy.type` = `OnDelete`(PR #101)
* #99 - update api deprecations with k8s 1.14 changelog
* #98 - change sync-mode logic with hpa support

* #97 - Fix for update PodDisruptionBudget
* Update k8s python client to version 9.0.0 (kubernetes 1.13 stable)
* Fix build on hub.docker.com from TAG
* #96 - update requests package to 2.22.0 for fix broken build(#95)
Close CVE-2019-10906

name: Custom resource support
body: Added support for custom resources and definitions.
* #85 - Add CustomResourceDefinition kind support
* #91 - Issue #76 (upgrade PyYAML)
* #90 -  Add support of NetworkPolicy
* #89 - Fix TemplateNotFound error message, extend README
* #87 - Add support of render, apply, delete commands, entrypoint refactoring.
*  Add requirements.txt to sdist for installation from sources works properly (fix pypi package)
* #81 - Add --tags and --skip-tags options

Readme updated with installation with pip
Add building pypi package automation
* #79 - Add support of LimitRange
- #78 - Fix getting k8s token from K8S_TOKEN env variable
#72 - It is not possible to concatenate several environment variables into one value ; PR #73
* #76 - replace yaml.load to yaml.safe_load PR #77
* #74 - fix: PVC try replace and failed ; PR #75
* #70 - Add command line script and setup.py
* #71 - Allow to deploy PodSecurityPolicy resouces
* #69 - exits with non zero exit code if job failed and show-logs flag provided

* #65 - Update requirements for python 3.7
* #66 - Add support of scheduling.k8s.io/v1beta1 API group
* #67 - fix docker image build :bug:

* https://github.com/2gis/k8s-handle/pull/62 - Add support of glob in include_file function
* https://github.com/2gis/k8s-handle/pull/63 - Use "hasattr()" to determine namespaced kinds
* https://github.com/2gis/k8s-handle/pull/64 - I-56 - Add support of PriorityClass from scheduling.k8s.io/v1alpha1
Initial release
